definition: Zhang Tingyu (1672-1755), Qing politician, senior minister to three successive emperors, oversaw compilation of History of the Ming Dynasty 明史[Ming2 shi3] and the Kangxi Dictionary 康熙字典[Kang1 xi1 Zi4 dian3]
surname Zhang
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
palace courtyard
jade

sentences.english: The History of the Ming Dynasty compiled by Zhang Tingyu presented the coexist aspectabout two theories of the Nine Frontier.
sentences.chinese: 张廷玉本《明史》呈现两种九边说法并存的局面。

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
